name: Unsatisfied Customer
description:
A small prototype I made over the weekend to illustrate the frustrations of being a food-service worker. As a former bartender and busboy myself, I've always had beef with customers who are never happy with anything, so here's an incredibly difficult, pointless game inspired by those wonderful people.

Use the mouse to salt the customers food. When the percentage turns green, you're in the clear. It doesn't matter with this customer though.
